thread.section_title: Grand Global Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Totally Satisfied
thread.title_full: Totally Satisfied - Review of Grand Global Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Sandra D
title: Totally Satisfied
text:
We stayed at The Grand Global in 2016 and are returning again this year.The staff went above and beyond to meet our needs.Totally satisfied with the rooms,they were very clean.Never seen any bugs but saw a couple of mosquitoes but nothing to complain about.When we went there in April things were pretty quiet once we went to bed.It was wonderful to have an air conditioner and when the power went the generator cut in right away.Keep up the good work.Hope to see you all again soon.
Room Tip: I had room 316.In my room there was 2 single beds with a beautiful sitting area. See more room tips
